text: 16.27: Sng 62.12; Snd 24.12; Sek 14.5; Mt 25.31; 26.64; Mk 8.38; Ru 9.26; Ro 2.6; 1 Pi 1.17; VB 22.12Fhe Bakɨme Guma Guar, ana zumgum won Ndiar vhava ŋaarar ŋkasŋka bakɨme phorgɨv ana enseri phorgɨp mbe zirɨrga. Ana mba tugen zirɨv, ana kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi ga suaŋv, vhezar mben nɨɨnga.
